title: Learning from the Past: Real-World Exploit Migration for Smart Contract PoC Generation
data:

the implementation of security measures such as manual audits and bug bounty 
platforms. A critical component often required by these security measures is the proof-

severity, and guides developers in fixes. Existing tools have explored automated

title: Inferring multiple helper Dafny assertions with LLMs
data:
Silva, A Mendes, R Martins- arXiv preprint arXiv:2511.00125, 2025

numerous manual helper assertions, creating a significant barrier to adoption. We 
investigate the use of Large Language Models (LLMs) to automatically infer missing

Cites: Assured automatic programming via large language models

title: SyzGrapher: Resource-Centric Graph-Based Kernel Fuzzing
data:
M Fleischer, H Green, I Grishchenko, C Kruegel
The operating system kernel manages system resources and makes them available 
to user-space programs through system calls (syscalls). Vulnerabilities in this syscall 
handling code could allow user-space programs to exploit the kernel, leading to 
information leaks or privilege escalation. Finding and patching kernel bugs is 
therefore critical for system security. Coverage-guided kernel fuzzers such as 
SYZKALLER have proven to be quite effective at discovering kernel bugs through
Cites: Stateful Greybox Fuzzing
